body.p: AppeX is a complete framework and tool set for builing web applications that coordinate server-side Smalltalk with client-side JavaScript. AppeX provides support for session management, server push, web sockets, AJAX, active record, and may be used with any of the popular Javascript libraries.
AppeX is provided in a set of parcels. Use the Parcel Manager to browse the Web Development folder, and to load the desired components.
For complete documentation, refer to the Web Application Developer's Guide.
